reviews.review_msg: This class is very interesting. Dr. Nicki really wants students to do well, and you can tell she is passionate about the course material. You can get up to 3 extra % by going to 3 health ethics club meetings and summarizing the content to the class. Dr. Nicki is respectful of students comments in class, and encourages dialogue. Good class.
this class is a typical health science class, very interesting. like it.

I heard some complaints about this course but I'm surprised.  She is helpful to studdents and I learned a lot. The prof is so smart though it's hard sometimes understanding her.  Get help with ta's for the essays.
Course has super interesting topics but prof is very disorganized. Just write well and you should be fine. Remember to incorporate stuff talked about in lecture and tutorials into the essays.

The class had a lot of controversial topics. Some discussions were uncomfor-table, but I learned a lot. Someone said "worse prof ever." That's crazy! She knows her stuff and writes great letters for students too!

If don't want to think then this course isn't for you.  The group discussion questions were always very clearly int the power points--all you have to do is be able to read.  Really hard working prof. I learned so much.

The worst prof I have ever had. I am a good student - GPA above 3.5 (I'm not saying this because I received a poor mark). Summary: Dr. Nicki is disorganized at best, encourages group discussions but is unclear about what we should be discussing, and is not helpful. The TA for the class was great though. Not a hard class just a waste of time!
This course was interesting and challenging.  Dr. Nicki   gave really good insight into the material. Assignments were fair.  Sometimes too much info. in slides.

Course material is very interesting, definitely learned a lot with the different topics we covered. Nicki encourages a lot of class discussion, sometimes jumps between stuff she talks about. The papers are tough because you have to be concise about what you write about, the TA marks pretty hard too but Dr. Nicki marks the final paper.
A real sweetheart though the ta marks hard. Urrgh... Really interesting class--things I've never thought of before and still think of after class.

I really like this class as she doesn't lecture much in a strict way which I like ! I love that the class is so interactive. It shoudl be because it's a course in critical thinking, not science or statistics.  I've taken other courses where the prof just talks and talks in a philosophy course which is very boring and useless.  Yeah she does sometim

I think she's a very lively and interesting person at times, but a horrible lecturer. The content itself is interesting, but she basically just reads off her slides (aka mumbles) for a few mins before starting discussion. Lec = Tut, basically. Also agreeing that she always interrupts students when they speak, which is irritating. Who does that?!

A good professor to take especially if you aren't a real thinker in philosophical concepts. She encourages lots of discussions and sharing opinions in lecture which makes it a lot easier to apply concepts into theories in biomedical health. The assignments are not very hard and focuses on the lecture materiaL. Will at least get a B in this course!

Did you say the professor just "reads from her powerpoints" ?   Sounds like you weren't much in class as there was a lot of discussion. I really liked the class as you got to hear a lot of different opinions and the prof. has a lot of knowledge.  My eyes were really opened.

One of the worst classes i have ever taken! She reads straight from her power point notes and interrupts students when they are trying to participate in the class. If your opinions different than hers you have no chance of being able to express it.  It's an easy credit but a waste of time.
this was a really fun course.  the knowlege i learned was unprecedented. sad but true--a lot of people cannot handle a really smart, strong wommin.

Worst prof ever, hands down. She knows very little about the subject area beyond her extremely limited and biased knowledge. If you disagree, she tries to belittle you, and she interrupts students constantly. She reads directly from her power point notes, this after it takes her twenty minutes to get them up on the projector. What a joke!
awesome prof!  class is interactive.  i agree, really interesting and i liked the assignments.

I like that she promotes a positive environment.  I was nervous about taking a philo. class.  But have been doing well. It's strange when people complain about a nice prof. who is helpful. Cna't understand this.
great prof!  i looked forward to the classses.  but if you don't like doing deep thinking yon won't like it

I really liked this class. Really interesting topics. She uses a lot of short film clips with lecture.  Gives a lot of help on papers.  You have to do the readings; or  lectures will be hard to understand.  Made me think hard about a lot of things I don't think about. Passionate, high energy prof.

I find the comments about this prof so weird.  She is sooo clear! She puts so much information in her ppts. And this really helps with the essay writing. Really interesting course.  She has a lot knowledge, is well spoken, caring toward students. I was scared about taking a phil course but she guides students well
overall.. shes pretty bad at teacher. the class is interesting but that's easily forgotten by her whistling. i wonder if she was ever told that whistling is rude! students are not dogs!

Worst prof ever. She is very unclear and disorganzied. She asks for your opinion and when you tell her she disagrees with you. When you ask a question, her responses dont even relate to what you asked her. She also likes to boast about how many places she has taught or how amazing and influental her work has been...shes annoying...

Be sure to participate in lecture, otherwise she will assume you haven't even shown up!But be careful, because if your comments are not in agreement with her own, she will assume you are wrong! As a prof, she is one of the worst!

She is so unorganized. She doesnt prepare her lecs so that they fit in the time-frame. sometimes we get no break and still arent even half way through the slides yet. If you have ONE tiny point to make that contradicts her, then she will be like "um. I guess." Her responses are so unclear. Her answering a question is like not answering a question.

Her lectures are pretty useless because she takes quotes out of the textbook and just reads them out word for word on the lecture slides. The tutorials were basically discussion groups amongst ourselves and did not help with our assignments or review the lec material. If you ask the prof for help she goes off-topic abt something else.
